section.title: Description
section.p: Run a query to find segments that are currently down. If more than zero rows are returned, a warning or alert should be generated.
section.title: Activity
Frequency
section.p: Run the query every five to fifteen minutes.
section.title: Corrective Action
section.p: Check that hosts that have down segments are responsive. If the hosts are OK, check the log file for the primary and mirror of the down segments to determine the root cause of the segments going down. If there are no unexpected errors, run the gprecoverseg utility to bring the segments back online.
